overview: George, a mature man in the midst of a mid-life crisis, nothing seems to be going right, his world is collapsing around him just like his relationship with his wife and kids, However thereâ€™s always different perspectives to discover and George decides to explore new ways of viewing his world, ways full of sex that make the most of any and every opportunity. You can discover them too in Private Beauty, a film full of private class starring the gorgeous Alexis Crystal, Lovita Fate, Cindy Shine, Brittany Bardot and Vinna Reed. Just like an old school classic, full of good writing and of course good sex, Private Beauty, be sure not to miss it!
title: Private Beauty
